title: Ms. Smith's deposit increases reserves, loans

content.question: Ms. Smith withdraws <math alttext="$1,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> from her safe and deposits the money in a bank. If the bank holds no excess reserves and the reserve requirement is <math alttext="10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent, how will this deposit increase the bank’s required reserves and the bank’s loans?

choices.label: Required ReservesLoans<math alttext="$1,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$9,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>9</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Required ReservesLoans<math alttext="$1,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$10,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>10</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Required ReservesLoans<math alttext="$900" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>900</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Required ReservesLoans<math alttext="$100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$900" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>900</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

Required ReservesLoans<math alttext="$100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$1,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: Required ReservesLoans<math alttext="$100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="$900" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>900</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
